summary: 2048 x 2048 resolution of the Highland Cow and Painted Cow. New/custom textures used
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15701][/url][/center]

[color=Lightskyblue][b]-Reviews-[/b][/color]
skinnydrumma says:
[color=gold][size=5]"looks great! endorsed."[/size][/color]

nickd97 says:
[color=gold][size=5]"Ah this is so nice! I can now walk past a farm and see a good-looking cow in the yard. Thanks!"[/size][/color]

[color=Silver][size=4]Vanilla Cows look awful on low, medium, high and ultra high settings. This mod fixes that. Using my own textures I have given the cows a cleaner, less pixelated look. This mod re-textures both the standard cow and the painted one. This mod works well with Hearth fire. Also. If you like my cows you should concider using my mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17865]Highland Milk Farm[/url] that allows you to milk all cows :)[/size][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21962]Wolverine2710's Automatic Variants Port for my Better Cows[/url]
author: yourenotsupposedtobeinhere

files.name: Better Cows v11
files.changelogHtml: Improved normals and normal alpha channels to improve reflection and shadows
